[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Edge case] [Maximum chunks] What is the maximum number of chunks that can be processed? Can exceeding this limit cause integer overflow or memory exhaustion? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Edge case] [Single validator] Does the encryption work correctly when eks contains only one encryption key? Can this degenerate case reveal the plaintext? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Edge case] [All-zero plaintext] Can encrypting all-zero chunks leak information or bypass security checks? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Edge case] [Maximum field elements] Can plaintexts at or near the field modulus cause wraparound issues in chunking or reconstruction? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Serialization] [Compression mode] The serialize_with_mode supports Compress parameter - can choosing wrong compression cause deserialization failures or security issues? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Serialization] [Write failure handling] The serialize functions return Result but what if writer fails mid-write? Can partial serialization cause state corruption? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Serialization] [Size calculation precision] Does serialized_size() exactly match the actual serialized bytes? Can mismatches cause buffer allocation errors? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Concurrency] [Shared state] If multiple threads use the same Homomorphism instance, can race conditions in reading pp or eks cause inconsistent ciphertext generation? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Concurrency] [RNG thread safety] Is the correlated_randomness() function thread-safe when called concurrently by multiple validators during DKG dealing? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Protocol] [Dealing verification] Can a malicious dealer create valid-looking ciphertexts that decrypt to incorrect shares, breaking the DKG secret sharing property? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Protocol] [Share consistency] Can different validators receive inconsistent ciphertexts that all verify correctly but decrypt to shares that don't reconstruct the secret? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Protocol] [Decryption correctness] Can the chunked ElGamal decryption produce plaintexts that differ from the original witness values due to rounding or field arithmetic errors? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Protocol] [Threshold security] In a threshold DKG protocol, can fewer than threshold validators decrypt their shares to break the security assumption? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Validation] [PublicParameters construction] The new() constructor for PublicParameters accepts arbitrary G and H - can malicious parameters break all downstream encryption? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Validation] [Homomorphism construction] No validation that pp and eks are cryptographically sound - can this allow construction of insecure homomorphisms? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Validation] [Witness construction] The Witness struct has no constructor validation - can invalid witnesses cause encryption to succeed but decryption to fail? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Validation] [CodomainShape construction] No validation that chunks and randomness have consistent dimensions - can this break homomorphic properties? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Arithmetic] [Field modulus] Are all field operations properly reduced modulo the field size, or can intermediate values overflow? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Arithmetic] [Scalar multiplication safety] Can scalar multiplication operations produce the point at infinity, breaking security assumptions? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Arithmetic] [MSM associativity] Is the MSM computation associative and commutative as expected, or can different evaluation orders produce different results? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Dependency] [arkworks security] The code depends on arkworks pairing libraries - can vulnerabilities in upstream dependencies break chunked ElGamal security? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Dependency] [unsafe_hash_to_affine] The default() uses unsafe_hash_to_affine - what are the security implications of 'unsafe' in this context? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Dependency] [sample_field_element] The RNG function sample_field_element is from external crate - is it cryptographically secure and unbiased? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Specification] [Security proof] Is there a formal security proof that the chunked ElGamal construction maintains ElGamal's semantic security? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-dkg/src/pvss/chunky/chunked_elgamal.rs] [Specification] [Homomorphism correctness] Is the homomorphism mathematically sound - does H(x+y) = H(x) + H(y) hold for all inputs? (High)
